Title: Drakespawn Knights
Legend: Cold-blooded Drakespawn make for formidable mounts, for not only do they carry their lance-bearing riders towards the enemy with sure-footed speed, their fangs and claws are sharp enough to tear through metal and bone with ease.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Battleline if general is ORDER SERPENTIS

Intro: Each model in a Drakespawn Knights unit is armed with a Barbed Lance

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Drakespawn are each armed with Ferocious Jaws.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Dread Knight. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Standard Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Hornblowers.

Rules.Name: Lance Charge
Rules.Fluff: As the Drakespawn thunder across the battlefield, lances are levelled ready to be driven deep into the enemy.
Rules.Rule: If this unit made a charge move in the same turn, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of its Barbed Lances and improve the Rend characteristic of its Barbed Lances by 1.
